ContentDescription: Describe their personal qualities and those of others, and explain how they contribute to developing identities

ContentDescription: Describe their personal qualities and those of others, and explain how they contribute to developing identities

ContentDescription: Describe their personal qualities and those of others, and explain how they contribute to developing identities

ContentDescription: Identify how different situations influence emotional responses

ContentDescription: Identify how different situations influence emotional responses

ContentDescription: Practise strategies they can use when they need to seek, give or deny permission respectfully

ContentDescription: Identify and demonstrate protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies they can use to help them and others stay safe

ContentDescription: Identify and demonstrate protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies they can use to help them and others stay safe

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify and demonstrate protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies they can use to help them and others stay safe

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Identify and demonstrate protective behaviours and help-seeking strategies they can use to help them and others stay safe

ContentDescription: Investigate a range of health messages and practices in their community and discuss their purposes

Subject: Health and Physical Education
ContentDescription: Participate in a range of physical activities in natural and outdoor settings, and investigate factors and settings that make physical activity enjoyable

Elaboration: Participating in children's games from First Nations Australian cultures, such as Keentan played by the Kalkadoon People of the north-west central districts of Queensland, and discussing similarities with other games and activities they enjoy

Elaboration: Participating in a range of minor games and exploring which ones they enjoy and what makes them enjoyable
